name: Camera Cut
description:
Ludum Dare 40 Entry (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/camera-cut)

In this frustrating and colorful game, called Camera Cut you will progressively accumulate more and more camera angle while the delay between camera cuts quicken. You progress by gathering mirror orbs and each level you will get a new camera angle.

Controls:

- WASD/Arrow -> Movement
- Space -> Jump
- Escape -> Pause

THIS GAME MIGHT HAS A LOT OF FLASHING COLORS AND MIGHT INDUCE ELLIPTIC SEIZURE
